description: Fnac Darty S.A. is a leading European retailer specializing in consumer electronics, household appliances, books, and entertainment products. The company operates through a network of stores and e-commerce platforms, serving millions of customers annually.

name: Jd.Com
description: JD.com is one of China's largest e-commerce companies, providing a wide range of products including electronics, apparel, and groceries, with a focus on technology-driven logistics and retail innovation.

name: Kesko Corporation
description: Kesko Corporation is a leading Finnish retail company operating in the grocery, building, and technical trade sectors. It serves customers through a network of stores and online platforms across Finland and other European countries.

name: Kao Corp.
description: Kao Corp. is a leading Japanese company specializing in consumer packaged goods, including beauty care, health care, and household products. The company is known for its innovative and sustainable solutions in personal care and hygiene.

name: Meijer, Inc.
description: Meijer, Inc. is a leading American supercenter chain that operates grocery stores, general merchandise stores, and pharmacies across the Midwest. Known for its one-stop shopping experience, Meijer is a pioneer in the retail industry.

name: NH Foods Ltd.
description: NH Foods Ltd. is a leading Japanese company specializing in the production and distribution of fresh meats, processed foods, and seafood products. It operates globally, providing high-quality food solutions to consumers and businesses.

name: Macy'S, Inc.
description: Macy's, Inc. is a leading American retailer operating department stores, offering a wide range of apparel, accessories, home goods, and beauty products. The company is known for its iconic Macy's brand and its commitment to delivering quality and value to customers.

name: Spectrum Brands Holdings
description: Spectrum Brands Holdings is a global consumer products company offering a wide range of products in home essentials, personal care, and pet care. The company operates across multiple brands, delivering innovative solutions to enhance everyday life.

name: Skechers
description: Skechers is a global leader in the lifestyle and performance footwear industry, offering a wide range of shoes, apparel, and accessories for men, women, and children.

name: Sprouts Farmers Market
description: Sprouts Farmers Market is a specialty grocery retailer offering fresh, natural, and organic products at affordable prices. The company focuses on healthy living and sustainable practices.

name: Signet Jewelers Limited
description: Signet Jewelers Limited is the world's largest retailer of diamond jewelry, operating brands such as Kay Jewelers, Zales, Jared, and others. The company specializes in offering a wide range of jewelry and watches through its retail stores and e-commerce platforms.

name: Sugi Holdings Co., Ltd.
description: Sugi Holdings Co., Ltd. operates in the retail industry, specializing in pharmacy and drugstore chains across Japan. The company focuses on providing healthcare products and services to its customers.

name: Stater Bros. Holdings Inc.
description: Stater Bros. Holdings Inc. operates a chain of supermarkets primarily in Southern California, offering groceries, fresh produce, and household essentials.

name: Sundrug Co., Ltd.
description: Sundrug Co., Ltd. is a leading Japanese retail company specializing in the sale of pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and daily necessities through its extensive network of drugstores and supermarkets.

name: Victoria'S Secret & Co.
description: Victoria's Secret & Co. is a leading specialty retailer of women's lingerie, beauty products, and apparel, known for its iconic brand and global presence.

name: Woolworths Limited
description: Woolworths Limited is a leading Australian retail company, operating supermarkets, liquor stores, and other retail businesses across the country. It is one of the largest employers in Australia and a key player in the retail industry.

name: Yodobashi Camera Co., Ltd.
description: Yodobashi Camera Co., Ltd. is a leading Japanese retail company specializing in consumer electronics, home appliances, and related products. It operates large-scale stores and an online platform catering to customers across Japan.

name: Zalando
description: Zalando is a leading European online platform for fashion and lifestyle, offering a wide range of clothing, footwear, and accessories to customers across multiple countries.

name: Avolta AG
description: Avolta AG, formerly known as Dufry AG, is a leading global travel retail company specializing in duty-free and duty-paid retail operations in airports, cruise lines, and other travel hubs.

name: Casino Guichard-Perrachon
description: Casino Guichard-Perrachon is a leading French retail group specializing in food and non-food distribution, operating a variety of supermarket and hypermarket chains across Europe and Latin America.

name: Academy Sports
description: Academy Sports + Outdoors is a leading retailer offering a wide range of sporting goods, outdoor equipment, and apparel for customers across the United States.

name: Clorox Company
description: The Clorox Company is a leading multinational manufacturer and marketer of consumer and professional products, including cleaning supplies, health and wellness items, and household goods.

name: Coles Group Limited
description: Coles Group Limited is a leading Australian retailer, operating supermarkets, liquor stores, and convenience outlets across the country. The company focuses on providing high-quality products and services to customers while promoting sustainability and innovation.

name: Kingfisher Plc
description: Kingfisher plc is a leading home improvement retail group operating across Europe, offering products and services to help customers improve their homes and gardens.

name: Stanley Black & Decker
description: Stanley Black & Decker is a leading global provider of tools, storage, and commercial electronic security solutions, serving professionals and consumers worldwide.

name: Migros-Genossenschafts-Bund
description: Migros-Genossenschafts-Bund is Switzerland's largest retail company, offering a wide range of products and services including supermarkets, food production, and non-food retail. It operates as a cooperative and is known for its focus on sustainability and community engagement.

name: Nike, Inc.
description: Nike, Inc. is a leading global designer, marketer, and distributor of athletic footwear, apparel, equipment, and accessories. The company is known for its innovative products and iconic branding.

name: LVMH Moët Hennessy-Louis Vuitton SA
description: LVMH is a world leader in luxury goods, encompassing a diverse portfolio of over 75 prestigious brands in fashion, cosmetics, wines, spirits, and jewelry.
